针对 TikTok 和 Temu 向中国发送用户数据而提出的 GDPR 投诉https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/gdpr-complaints-filed-against-tiktok-temu-for-sending-user-data-to-china/ Thu, 16 Jan 2025 17:34:08 -0500比尔·图拉斯SecurityLegal https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/gdpr-complaints-filed-against-tiktok-temu-for-sending-user-data-to-china/ Non-profit privacy advocacy group "None of Your Business" (noyb) has filed six complaints against TikTok, AliExpress, SHEIN, Temu, WeChat, and Xiaomi, for unlawfully transferring European user's data to China and infringing European Union's general data protection regulation (GDPR). The storm is building, and the worst is yet to come. [...]
